listitem.para: Saves the definitions of the procedures, variables, and property lists specified by contentslist to a file named filename.

listitem.programlisting:
TO MYPROG1 PRINT "Hello1 END
TO MYPROG2 PRINT "Hello2 END
POTS TO MYPROG1 TO MYPROG2
SAVEL [[MYPROG1] [] []] "myprogs.lgo ERALL POTS LOAD "myprogs.lgo POTS TO MYPROG1
